placeInfo: {'id': '13413633', 'name': 'Oak Ray Haridra Beach Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 496, 'locationString': 'Wadduwa, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.645429, 'longitude': 79.93429, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g499081-d13413633-Reviews-Oak_Ray_Haridra_Beach_Resort-Wadduwa_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://oakrayharidra.com/', 'address': '921 Parallel Rd Pohodaramulla, Wadduwa 12560 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '921 Parallel Rd', 'street2': 'Pohodaramulla', 'city': 'Wadduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '12560'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 33, 'count2': 21, 'count3': 35, 'count4': 85, 'count5': 322}}
text:
We just visited Sri Lanka and have a chance to be in one of very nice hotel: OAK Ray hotel.
Let me share with you a few notes to give you a clear understanding about the hotel its self, the team, food and ocean)
¬†
The hotel is not too big, very comfortable, with a few types of rooms: from standard to presidential suit. All prices are really fine, so you can choose the best for you. The Very nice thing is that all rooms have their own ocean view! And it is amazing to see sunrise or sunset from your room.
The hotel team is very attentive and always ready to support and help. Key-persons speak very-well English, so no probs with any demands. I‚Äôd like to say that Mr Susantha ‚Äì general manager is always in the hotel, controlling all processes. Mr Gishantha Withana ‚Äì senior manager of the restaurant with his team is very smiley and open to show you Sri Lankan traditional food: during the lunch you will have a possibility to try seafood, chicken, fish or beef curry, very tasty and always fresh fruits and juices. Don‚Äôt forget to ask for the real Sri Lankan tea as a cocktail!) It‚Äôs really very cool and nice. ¬† ¬†
¬†
One more thing I‚Äôd like to share ‚Äì the OAK RAY ayurvedic center. It is located inside the hotel. Annushka ‚Äì one of the best master I ever met before. First of all ‚Äì he is multi-time certified professional with medical background who does different types of massage himself, Secondly ‚Äì he is very nice, open, supportive and caring person. I strongly recommend to take a program during your stay in the hotel. The price is more then affordable.
¬†
Have a good trip!
title: The best week in the ocean

text: We travelled with two kids. The staff is always very helpful especially SuSantha & Sanjaya & Jagath. The swimming pool is huge and in March the water temperature is 32 degrees Celsius also the Ocean temperature is around 32 degrees Celsius. Beautiful Ocean view from each room. Easy access to the beach. The food is good quality and tasty, it doesn't change a lot day by day but always fresh and suitable for vegans or vegetarians. Please note that this hotel has Sri Lankan five star standard and it is different than European five star hotel.

placeInfo: {'id': '13413633', 'name': 'Oak Ray Haridra Beach Resort', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 496, 'locationString': 'Wadduwa, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.645429, 'longitude': 79.93429, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g499081-d13413633-Reviews-Oak_Ray_Haridra_Beach_Resort-Wadduwa_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'http://oakrayharidra.com/', 'address': '921 Parallel Rd Pohodaramulla, Wadduwa 12560 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '921 Parallel Rd', 'street2': 'Pohodaramulla', 'city': 'Wadduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '12560'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 33, 'count2': 21, 'count3': 35, 'count4': 85, 'count5': 322}}
roomTip: Sun beds get very busy by 9am so get yours before then.
text:
We stayed at the hotel for 2 nights which cost a total of ¬£400 so I had high expectations. The location, beach and main big pool were excellent and the best part of our stay. Unfortunately our room which was a family room was in need of some refurbishment. We had our own private pool with tiles falling apart around the edges and the pool itself had not been filtered and was full of flies and debris.
Our bed was broken and held up by a board and the edges around the bed were also broken. 
We had paid for all inclusive but unfortunately the buffet lacked variety and seemed to cater to the European clientele only which is surprising as we were expecting to eat traditional Sri Lankan food. We were told on Valentine's Day that there will be a good selection of food but unfortunately it was one of the worst buffets we had as there was only bland salads and spaghetti again disappointing.
Although the weather and the pool itself made this break enjoyable the hotel and food was disappointing and we won't be staying here again.
title: Beautiful location but hotel itself needs a lot of improvement

placeInfo: {'id': '7358937', 'name': 'Taprobana Wadduwa By Asia Leisure', 'rating': 4.5, 'numberOfReviews': 523, 'locationString': 'Wadduwa, Western Province', 'latitude': 6.676711, 'longitude': 79.922066, 'webUrl': 'https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g499081-d7358937-Reviews-Taprobana_Wadduwa_By_Asia_Leisure-Wadduwa_Western_Province.html', 'website': 'https://www.facebook.com/TaprobanaSriLanka/', 'address': '354/16 Rathnayake Road, Wadduwa 12560 Sri Lanka', 'addressObj': {'street1': '354/16 Rathnayake Road', 'street2': None, 'city': 'Wadduwa', 'state': None, 'country': 'Sri Lanka', 'postalcode': '12560'}, 'ratingHistogram': {'count1': 14, 'count2': 9, 'count3': 24, 'count4': 102, 'count5': 374}}
text:
**Mixed Feelings at Taprobana by Asia Leisure**

Our recent visit to Taprobana by Asia Leisure left us with mixed feelings. We booked two rooms for a family gathering, including a birthday celebration for our kids and accommodation for our mother-in-law. While there were some positives, overall, the experience fell short of our expectations.

Firstly, the food at Taprobana was a highlight. We enjoyed well-prepared dishes that satisfied our taste buds, albeit the spread could have been more extensive to cater adequately for everyone.

On the downside, the location seemed somewhat neglected. Maintenance issues were noticeable, which detracted from the overall ambiance. Additionally, our rooms were not as clean as we had hoped, which was disappointing given the reputation of the establishment.

The weather didn't cooperate either, as it was a rainy day during our stay. This limited our outdoor activities and impacted our ability to fully enjoy the surroundings.

One positive aspect was the pool, which provided a refreshing escape despite the weather. It was well-maintained and offered a pleasant experience for both children and adults.

In summary, while Taprobana by Asia Leisure has its merits, such as good food and a decent pool, the overall experience was marred by issues with cleanliness, maintenance, and the weather conditions. For a special occasion like a birthday celebration, we expected a higher level of satisfaction.
title: Mixed Feelings at Taprobana by Asia Leisure
